resources.description: An online learning platform offering courses to enhance your Mattermost knowledge and skills.
Comprehensive guides and manuals for installing, configuring, and using Mattermost effectively.
A portal to submit and track support requests directly with Mattermost's support team.
Detailed service level agreements outlining Mattermost's commitment to supporting its users and customers.
A detailed log of new features, improvements, and bug fixes in each Mattermost release.
Information on the lifecycle of Mattermost releases, including support and maintenance periods.
Insights into Mattermostâ€™s future plans and upcoming features.
A community-driven forum for discussions, troubleshooting, and community support.
The official GitHub organization page where users can find all Mattermost source code and repositories.
The latest security advisories, updates, and patches for Mattermost products.
Detailed documentation for developers on how to use and integrate with the Mattermost API.
Where contributors can learn how to contribute to MM projects and how to integrate and extend MM functionality.
